Package dev.kkorolyov.sqlob.util

Class PersistenceHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.sqlob.util.PersistenceHelper

  • public final class PersistenceHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static utility methods for translating properties between Java and SQL.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public static java.lang.String getName​(java.lang.Class<?> c)
        Returns the name of the table associated with class c. Table name defaults to the name of the class, but may be customized with the Table annotation.
        Parameters:
        c - class to get table name for
        Returns:
        name of table matching c
        See Also:
        Table

      • getName

        public static java.lang.String getName​(java.lang.reflect.Field f)
        Returns the name of the column associated with field f. Column name defaults to the name of the field, but may be customized with the Column annotation.
        Parameters:
        f - field to get column name for
        Returns:
        name of column matching f
        See Also:
        Column

      • getFieldTableName

        public static java.lang.String getFieldTableName​(java.lang.reflect.Field f)
        Returns the name of the table associated with field f. This is meant for special cases where a field requires its own table instead of a column on the declaring class's table. Table name is defined as {DECLARING_CLASS_NAME}_{FIELD_NAME}
        Parameters:
        f - field to get table name for
        Returns:
        name of table matching f

      • getPersistableFields

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.reflect.Field> getPersistableFields​(java.lang.Class<?> c)
        Returns:
        all declared fields in c matching the requirements of isPersistable(Field)

      • isPersistable

        public static boolean isPersistable​(java.lang.reflect.Field f)
        Checks whether f is a "persistable" field. A field is deemed persistable if it is 
           - Not static
   - Not transient
   - Not Transient
   - Not synthetic
        Parameters:
        f - field to test
        Returns:
        whether f is a persistable field
